alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:37PM EDT until July 30 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dodge County in central Georgia... Central Wilcox County in central Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 437 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Abbeville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Rochelle, Rhine, Pitts, Browning, Five Points, Cedar Creek, and Antioch Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
